metadata.title: CVE-2024-50272 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:filemap: Fix bounds checking in filemap_read()If the caller supplies an iocb->ki_pos value that is close to thefilesystem upper limit, and an iterator with a count that causes us tooverflow that limit, then filemap_read() enters an infinite loop.This behaviour was discovered when testing xfstests generic/525 with the"localio" optimisation for loopback NFS mounts.
